name: Pop Hub
description:
The path to stardom is never easy. Enter Pop Hub, a text-based game that lets you pave your own way into the chaotic music industry. Experience realistic scenarios that leave you wondering if being a Pop Star is truly all about the glamour.

Features:

  1. Interrelated Story That Keeps You Going
  2. Interesting Characters 
  3. Two Unique Routes and Four Possible Endings (Both Routes Are Drastically Different, But Add A Different Layer To The Story)
  4. Mature Themes Revolving The Music Industry
  5. Customise Names For Your Own Music
  6. Funtastic Amateur Art For Laughs

Art Credits (Check Em' Out): https://www.facebook.com/yongqidraws/
